title: Twitch recall STILL no sounds?
body: I reported this anomaly a few patches ago. Twitch seems to have no recall sounds in every skin except SSW Twitch. KateyKhaos said that it would get looked at, and there seems to be no attention to it.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

I did say it would get looked at! :] 

Since this isn't a gameplay impacting bug, it falls a bit lower on the priority list. I'd be happy to poke the team working on the issue again, though!
Yeah, KateyKhaos also said that the teemo shroom's being blue in the top left corner was gonna get fixed too...

I said we'd look into the issue. :] 

Some issues take less priority than others. The issue is still open, and will be addressed.
